title: Stock notifications duplicated when editing products with combinations at back-end
body:
There is a problem with seller stock notifications when updating a product with combinations at back-end. At 1.7 Prestashop version, all the combinations are stored at the same time when updating a product, so if you have a stock alert (for example, alert for 0 quantity), and you update a variable product with 10 combinations, 5 of them having 0 stock, you will get 5 email with stock notifications, one for each combination, even if you doesn't change stocks nor combinations.

This is not appropriate, the seller doesn't have to get any stock notification when updating a product at back-end, only when stock changes because a order is placed. Maybe the hook the module is using is not suitable?
